00029 class simbio_qparser
00030 {
00031     private $keyword_query = '';
00032     private $default_fields = array();
00033     private $field_aliases = array();
00034     public $string_search_fields = array();
00035     public $exact_match_fields = array();
00036 
00043     public function __construct($str_query, $arr_default_fields)
00044     {
00045         $this->keyword_query = trim($str_query);
00046         $this->default_fields = $arr_default_fields;
00047     }
00048 
00049 
00056     private function addBoolean($str_words)
00057     {
00058         $_result = '';
00059         foreach (explode(' ', $str_words) as $word) {
00060             $word = trim($word);
00061             if (stripos('+', $word) === false) {
00062                 $_result .= '+'.$word.' ';
00063             } else { $_result .= $word.' '; }
00064         }
00065 
00066         return trim($_result);
00067     }
00068 
00069 
00070     /*
00071      * Method to extract phrase from string
00072      *
00073      * @param   array   $arr_phrase
00074      * return   void
00075      */
00076     private function phraseExtract(&$arr_phrase, $str_query = '')
00077     {
00078         // get the phrase query
00079         $_phrase_matches = array();
00080         $_phrase = preg_match_all('@(".+?")@i', !empty($str_query)?$str_query:$this->keyword_query, $_phrase_matches);
00081         $arr_phrase = $_phrase_matches[0];
00082         // remove all phrase from original query
00083         $str_query = trim(str_replace($arr_phrase, '', $this->keyword_query));
00084     }
00085 
00086 
00091     public final function parse()
00092     {
00093         if (!$this->keyword_query) {
00094             return;
00095         }
00096         $_result = '';
00097         $_original_query = $this->keyword_query;
00098         // get query with field qualifier
00099         $_qualifier_matches = array();
00100         $_qualifier = preg_match_all('@([a-z0-9_.]+:[^:]+[^a-z0-9_.:])@i', $this->keyword_query.' ', $_qualifier_matches);
00101         $_qualifier_query = $_qualifier_matches[0];
00102         // remove all qualifiers query from original query
00103         $this->keyword_query = trim(str_replace($_qualifier_query, '', $this->keyword_query.' '));
00104 
00105         // parse and map keyword with field qualifier
00106         if ($_qualifier_query) {
00107             foreach ($_qualifier_query as $_each_qualifier) {
00108                 list($_field, $_words) = explode(':', $_each_qualifier);
00109                 $_words = trim($_words);
00110                 // check for field alias
00111                 $_field = trim($_field);
00112                 if (isset($this->field_aliases[$_field])) {
00113                     $_field = $this->field_aliases[$_field];
00114                 }
00115                 // get phrases
00116                 $_phrases = array();
00117                 $this->phraseExtract($_phrases, $_words);
00118                 // check for field search method
00119                 if (in_array($_field, $this->string_search_fields)) {
00120                     $_tmp_result = '( ';
00121                     $_tmp_words = explode(' ', $_words);
00122                     foreach ($_tmp_words as $_word) {
00123                         $_tmp_result .= "`$_field` LIKE '%$_word%' AND ";
00124                     }
00125                     $_tmp_result = substr_replace($_tmp_result, '', -5);
00126                     $_result .= $_tmp_result.' ) AND ';
00127                 } else if (in_array($_field, $this->exact_match_fields)) {
00128                     if (preg_match('@.+\|.+@i', $_words)) {
00129                         $_concat_words = '';
00130                         $_tmp_words = explode('|', $_words);
00131                         foreach ($_tmp_words as $_word) {
00132                             $_concat_words .= "'$_word',";
00133                         }
00134                         $_concat_words = substr_replace($_concat_words, '', -1);
00135                         $_result .= $_field.' IN ('.$_concat_words.') AND ';
00136                     } else if ($_words == 'NOEMPTY') {
00137                         $_result .= '('.$_field.'!=\'\' OR '.$_field.' IS NOT NULL) AND ';
00138                     } else if ($_words == 'EMPTY') {
00139                         $_result .= '('.$_field.'=\'\' OR '.$_field.' IS NULL) AND ';
00140                     } else {
00141                         $_result .= $_field.'=\''.$_words.'\' AND ';
00142                     }
00143                 } else {
00144                     $_words_str = $this->addBoolean($_words);
00145                     $_words_str = trim($_words_str);
00146                     if ($_words_str == '+') {
00147                         $_words_str = '';
00148                     }
00149                     $_phrases_str = '';
00150                     foreach ($_phrases as $_phrase) {
00151                         $_phrases_str .= $_phrase.' ';
00152                     }
00153                     $_phrases_str = trim($_phrases_str)?' '.$_phrases_str:'';
00154                     $_result .= "(MATCH(`$_field`) AGAINST ('$_words_str"."$_phrases_str' IN BOOLEAN MODE)) AND ";
00155                 }
00156             }
00157             // remove the last AND
00158             $_result = substr_replace($_result, '', -5);
00159         }
00160 
00161         // check for the rest of query
00162         $_rest_result = '';
00163         $_rest_result_phrase = '';
00164         if ($this->keyword_query) {
00165             // phrase extract
00166             $_phrases2 = array();
00167             $this->phraseExtract($_phrases2);
00168             if ($_phrases2) {
00169                 foreach ($this->default_fields as $_field) {
00170                     foreach ($_phrases2 as $_phrase) {
00171                         $_phrase = str_replace('"', '', $_phrase);
00172                         $_rest_result_phrase .= " `$_field` LIKE '%$_phrase%' OR ";
00173                     }
00174                 }
00175                 // remove the last AND
00176                 $_rest_result_phrase = substr_replace($_rest_result_phrase, '', -4);
00177             }
00178 
00179             if ($this->keyword_query) {
00180                 // explode string by space
00181                 $_words = explode(' ', $this->keyword_query);
00182                 foreach ($this->default_fields as $_field) {
00183                     $_rest_result .= "( ";
00184                     foreach ($_words as $_word) {
00185                         $_rest_result .= "`$_field` LIKE '%$_word%' AND ";
00186                     }
00187                     $_rest_result = substr_replace($_rest_result, '', -5);
00188                     $_rest_result .= " ) OR ";
00189                 }
00190                 // remove the last OR
00191                 $_rest_result = substr_replace($_rest_result, '', -4);
00192             }
00193         }
00194 
00195         if ($_rest_result_phrase) {
00196             $_result .= ' AND ('.$_rest_result_phrase.')';
00197         }
00198         if ($_rest_result) {
00199             $_result .= ' AND ('.$_rest_result.')';
00200         }
00201         $_result = preg_replace('@^\s*OR\s|^\s*AND\s@i', '', $_result);
00202         return $_result;
00203     }
00204 
00205 
00212     public function setFieldAliases($arr_field_aliases)
00213     {
00214         $this->field_aliases = $arr_field_aliases;
00215     }
00216 
00217 
00224     public function setSearchStringFields($arr_fields)
00225     {
00226         $this->string_search_fields = $arr_fields;
00227     }
00228 
00229 
00236     public function setExactMatchFields($arr_fields)
00237     {
00238         $this->exact_match_fields = $arr_fields;
00239     }
00240 }
